Uses of Package
aips.search

Packages that use aips.search
Package Description
aips.search  
aips.search.informed  
  • Classes in aips.search used by aips.search
    Class Description
    Action
    This abstract class defines all methods that an action (which changes state) must have.
    ActionStatePair
    When a node is expanded, the successor function generates a list of action-state pairs.
    Node
    This class models a node in the search tree.
    Path
    This class models a path that traces the route from a root node to a node in the tree.
    State
    This interface defines the methods required on a problem state.
  • Classes in aips.search used by aips.search.informed
    Class Description
    Node
    This class models a node in the search tree.
    Path
    This class models a path that traces the route from a root node to a node in the tree.
    SearchProblem
    This class defines the default behaviour of a search problem.
    State
    This interface defines the methods required on a problem state.
